
Here are detailed test cases for 1.1 Add Product to Cart:

Test Case 1: Add Single Product to Cart
Preconditions:

User is on the homepage.
Cart is empty.
Steps:

Locate the product "Brocolli - 1 Kg".
Click the "+" button to set quantity to 1 (if not already).
Click the "ADD TO CART" button.
Expected Result:

"Brocolli - 1 Kg" is added to the cart.
Cart icon updates to show 1 item.
Cart price updates to ₹120.
"✔ ADDED" confirmation appears on the product.
Test Case 2: Add Product with Increased Quantity
Preconditions:

User is on the homepage.
Cart is empty.
Steps:

Locate "Brocolli - 1 Kg".
Click "+" multiple times to set quantity to 3.
Click "ADD TO CART".
Expected Result:

"Brocolli - 1 Kg" is added to the cart with quantity 3.
Cart icon shows 3 items.
Cart price updates to ₹360.
"✔ ADDED" confirmation appears.
Test Case 3: Add Product with Default Quantity
Preconditions:

User is on the homepage.
Cart is empty.
Steps:

Locate "Brocolli - 1 Kg".
Click "ADD TO CART" without changing quantity.
Expected Result:

"Brocolli - 1 Kg" is added to the cart with quantity 1.
Cart icon shows 1 item.
Cart price updates to ₹120.
Test Case 4: Add Product Already in Cart
Preconditions:

"Brocolli - 1 Kg" is already in the cart with quantity 1.
Steps:

Locate "Brocolli - 1 Kg".
Click "+" to increase quantity to 2.
Click "ADD TO CART" again.
Expected Result:

Cart updates "Brocolli - 1 Kg" quantity to 2.
Cart icon shows 2 items.
Cart price updates to ₹240.
Test Case 5: Add Product with Zero Quantity (Negative Test)
Preconditions:

User is on the homepage.
Cart is empty.
Steps:

Locate "Brocolli - 1 Kg".
Click "-" to set quantity to 0.
Attempt to click "ADD TO CART".
Expected Result:

Product is not added to cart.
Error or validation message is shown.
Cart icon remains at 0 items.
